page.title: 04PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: These are our most popular games at scool.These are 'dobby'games.Dobby means,to catch someone. {THE RHYME. With most dobby games you put your foot in the middle. Someone touches each persons foot,saying {"Ip dip dation corporation {How many buses are in the station?" Someone says a number between 1_10, and who evers foot it lands on is out. The person with the remaining foot is on. {DOBBY SCARECROW.} The person who is on has to try and dob the other people.When someone has been caught they have to stand like a scarecrow and wait until someone goes under their arm.The person who is dobbed three times is on.
